sen.e: He left many writings including "Zaijarin" and "Shizakoshiki", both of which criticized Honen's Jodo Sect, "Yumeki", which recorded dreams which he had during his 40 years' kangyo, and "Kyakuhaiboki", which was taken notes by his disciples.
